column4: Veeger1/Stevethepirate: you'll need a ./configure --with-cards=hda-intel --with-codec=hda-intel-(type of your chipset)
is that required or does alsa autodetect? it's fairly good these days
i couldn't be absolutely positive, but a friend had a realtek in an nvidia 7050 that needed the hint
(it wouldn't work with 1.0.14/15 whatever 7.10 defaults to atm)
